You are here: [Welcome Home] > [HtmlReference HTML Reference] > [CharacterEntities Character entities] > [CharacterEntitiesD D] > &dzcy;

== Value ==

There are 2 variations of this entity:

  * `&DZcy;` maps to the Unicode character [http://www.fileformat.info/info/unicode/char/040f/index.htm U+0040F].
  * `&dzcy;` maps to the Unicode character [http://www.fileformat.info/info/unicode/char/045f/index.htm U+0045F].
